item.title: Art / Larena Amin
item.dc:creator: farrantjames97
item.description:
Larena’s simplistic writing style tends to be dotted with classical vocabulary ... and a romantic flair often reserved for masters of the villanelle ... or the voice of a more gentle poet - juxtaposing the mundane ...

The post <span>Art</span><span id=hspan2> /</span><span id=hspan3> Larena Amin</span> appeared first on SUM.
item.content:encoded:
21 year old Larena Amin is a London-raised and based poet. With their main interests lying in history, culture, and emotions, each issue of their latest collaborative project has chronologically explored themes that dictate the experience of being alive. Themes have included the somewhat straight-forward discipline and love, or the conflicting and defeating experiences of hardship and over-sharing. Larena’s simplistic writing style tends to be dotted with classical vocabulary and a romantic flair often reserved for masters of the villanelle or the voice of a more gentle poet – juxtaposing the mundane or difficult nature of the objects which Larena dissects.

Shah Rez – by Larena

A wilting Shadow

Mimics the summers marigold

Eyes engaged with the everlong wall,

My second self dances upon its poise, and fruitful peel.

Dependent on the leering sun,

Perverse for her few winter hours.

shame, polyfilla, and a cold creep,

paint the aimless Pimlico street.

Existing in two halves, the spirit,

Chilled stiff – affected – by the

space between sounds.

Snowstars dew my unbatted eyelash.

LEVELS is a collaborative project between Kurdish-British poet Larena Amin and a variety of artists from the UK, Europe, and Further. PDF issues and video downloads are currently available to purchase on larenalevels.bigcartel.com.

To keep up with Larena, follow her on Instagram, and check out her website, where you can subscribe to email alerts and poems.

The post <span>Art</span><span id=hspan2> /</span><span id=hspan3> Larena Amin</span> appeared first on SUM.
